title: Color Contrast
itunes:title: Color Contrast
description:
THU 9/8 - Comedian Gary Owen stops by The Breakfast Club to talk about his new reality show on BET (yes, Black Entertainment Television), how he handles today's racial climate with a multi-racial family, why he had to readjust his stance on the Kaepernick-Flag fiasco and why he thinks about ice cream when he sees black people. Sweet guy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
